hero.title: Science, Technology, Engineering, Arts & Mathematics
hero.subtitle: Prepare for the future with hands-on STEAM education. From coding and game development to AI and entrepreneurship, our programs combine creativity with cutting-edge technology.

successStories.name: Alex Chen
successStories.achievement: Built a web app that tracks homework for his entire school
successStories.quote: GrowWise taught me that coding isn't just about syntax - it's about solving real problems.

successStories.name: Sophia Rodriguez
successStories.achievement: Published her first game on Roblox with 10,000+ plays
successStories.quote: Creating games taught me creativity, problem-solving, and how to turn ideas into reality.

successStories.name: Marcus Johnson
successStories.achievement: Started his own tutoring business helping younger students
successStories.quote: The entrepreneurship program gave me the confidence to turn my passion into a business.
